column4: I can't enable Compiz. It's kinda long story. Can someone help?
do you have the necessary restricted drivers?
Yes. That's part of my tragic tale.

I made the mistake of "upgrading from those drivers to the nVidia provided ones from their website, and it broke verything. After getting my restricted drivers back in and putting in my backed up xorg.conf, I can't start compiz, and I kinda need it.
